members.name: _markAsStale

excerptTokens.text:
<{
    value: V;
    ticks: number;
}, void, void>

members.docComment:
/**
 * Registers a side effect to be called on the next tick.
 *
 * @see
 *
 * Ticker:onThisOrNextTick()
 */
members.name: onNextTick

members.docComment:
/**
 * Registers for fn to be called either on this tick or the next tick.
 *
 * If registerSideEffect() is called while Ticker.tick() is running, the side effect _will_ be called within the running tick. If you don't want this behavior, you can use registerSideEffectForNextTick().
 *
 * Note that fn will be added to a Set(). Which means, if you call registerSideEffect(fn) with the same fn twice in a single tick, it'll only run once.
 */
members.name: onThisOrNextTick

excerptTokens.text: <infer T_1> ? T_1 : P extends null | undefined ? P : unknown
